summary:
This is a small mod that kinda add stuffs to Solitude. (Statues/Humongous Trees/Gigantic Banners)
Use this as a Sample and Suggest how to make it better. Users Suggestion is a Great help!
descriptionHtml:
This is a small mod that kinda add stuffs to Solitude. (Statues/Humongous Trees/Gigantic Banners)

So, this is like a "Test it - then - suggest - something" mod. I really don't know what to do with Solitude, Because it is a Castle-like with a concrete ground/walls/buildings on it, then it has some huge pine trees, so i don't know what to mess up! (LOL)

Installation:
Drag the files to your Data folder then activate it via NMM or Skyrim Launcher.

Conflicts?
some mods that edit Solitude too (Things that add stuff on the places i used on this mod)

Bugs?
Nope

Please! Try and Suggest! That will be a great help to make the "Life to Solitude" Project, and to the other "Life to" series.

ex.
What should i use for trees?
Aspen or Pine?

Help me and Help the other users by suggesting via PM's or Commenting. (I use my own mods of course! Let's help each other!)

Credits
Tamira & 3dgenerator - Statues (Again)
Bethesda - Skyrim/CK
Nexus - Awesome site
author: SkyrimFreeLancer
